com.here.android.mpa.guidance

Class NavigationManager.RealisticViewListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.guidance.NavigationManager.RealisticViewListener
  • Enclosing class:
    NavigationManager

    public abstract static class NavigationManager.RealisticViewListener
extends java.lang.Object
    RealisticViewListenerAdapter provides callback of realistic view related events from NavigationManager. By default, empty implementations are provided for all callbacks, users may selectively overload specific methods that are of interest.

    No callback will be triggered if the HERE license key is invalid.

    See Also:
    NavigationManager.setRealisticViewMode(RealisticViewMode)

      • onRealisticViewNextManeuver

        public void onRealisticViewNextManeuver(NavigationManager.AspectRatio ratio,
                               Image junctionImage,
                               Image signImageIn2D)
        Callback for notifying the junction view and 2D sign image for the next maneuver.
        Parameters:
        ratio - The aspect ratio of the returned images.
        junctionImage - The junction view image.
        signImageIn2D - The 2D sign image.

        Parameters:
        ratio - The aspect ratio of the returned images.
        junctionImage - The junction view image.
        signImageIn2D - A 2D sign image.
